text: The Omagh bombing was a car bomb attack by the Real Irish Republican Army in Omagh, County Tyrone, Northern Ireland, on 15 August 1998. It killed 29 people and injured 300 others. ==References== Category:1998 in the United Kingdom Category:1990s building bombings Category:1990s crimes in the United Kingdom Category:1990s in Northern Ireland Category:1990s murders in Europe Category:Attacks on buildings and structures in Northern Ireland Category:Building bombings in the United Kingdom Category:Car and truck bombings in Europe Category:County Tyrone Category:Explosions in Northern Ireland Category:Irish Republican Army Category:Mass murder in Northern Ireland Category:Mass murder in the 1990s Category:Massacres in the United Kingdom Category:Terrorist incidents in the 1990s Category:The Troubles Category:Car and truck bombings in the 1990s
title: Omagh bombing
